parameters.name: DrdsInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the PolarDB-X 1.0 instance.

parameters.name: ParamLevel
parameters.description:
The type of nodes whose parameters you want to query. Valid values:

*   **INSTANCE: the instance level.**
*   **DB**: the database level.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the PolarDB-X 1.0 instance is created.
